recap_documents.description: MEMORANDUM AND ORDER re  205  Motion for Attorney Fees (Revised Fee Application):  As set forth in the attached Memorandum and Order, Plaintiff's revised fee application (ECF No.  205 ) is GRANTED in part and DENIED in part. Plaintiff is awarded attorney's fees in the amount of $50,793.75, to be paid by the County Defendants.  So Ordered by Magistrate Judge James M. Wicks on 12/26/2024.  (DF)
